MS MCQs

    Use Resource Scheduling Optimization for Dynamics 365 Field Service

    »

    1. In which of the following scenarios would you be most likely to leverage Single Resource Optimization?

      To optimize all of tomorrow scheduled and unscheduled item.

      To adjust a technician’s schedule after a cancellation.

      To automatically schedule an emergency work order.

      To schedule high priority work orders throughout the day.


    2. One of your customer’s has a technician they prefer to work with. The technician is currently scheduled to work on a work order for the customer. You want to ensure that when RSO runs, the booking can be moved to different times as needed, but only if the currently scheduled tech does the work. How accomplish this for the booking?

      Define a Resource Scheduling Lock Option.

      Define a Time Scheduling Lock Option.

      Define a Resource and Time Scheduling Lock Option.

      Define a Time Range Scheduling Lock Option.


    3. Which of the following scenarios best describes a booking conflict as it relates to RSO?

      Two bookings scheduled for the same technician.

      A booking that was rescheduled.

      A requirement that is manually edited during optimization.

      A requirement that was not scheduled.
